item.title: Echoing in .bashrc clashes scp data transfer
item.description: One day when I tried to run scp to transfer data, the command somehow didn’t run at att. It was caused by doing echo in .bashrc. You have to make it conditional to interactive mode so that scp runs without the problem. Reference: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/12440287/scp-doesnt-work-when-echo-in-bashrc So the last a few lines of my .bashrc should be like: if [[ $- =~ "i" ]]; then echo something fi
